Posts.Content: my mom didn't survie her 2nd 5 years survival rate she survived the first 5 years then at 6 th years developede cancer in the other breast had her 2nd mastectomy then in sept 2005 her cancer returned a third time in the bones she survived 3 months after the diagnosis and others i have talked to this is what happened to their family memebers also i hope your mom survives good luck
Posts.Title: Living with cancer the second time around

Posts.Content: all I can say at this point is that mom mom would have been 81 in august about 2 weeks from now i will celebrate her birthday with out her it will be sad and lonely it will be 5 months the 4th of august since she left Love your Parents with all your heart no matter how much of a burden they can be, because when that final moment comes and they are no longer on this earth you never realize how much you miss them until they are gone i know my mom is in heaven with my dad and that she is whole again and she has no more pain, no more suffering, no more tears but i do miss both my mom and dad tremendously and wish they were still here i miss having mom to talk to and talking to her picture is just not the same ! love too all of you survivors.
Posts.Title: Living with cancer the second time around

Posts.Content: thank you mom mom suffered with the pain not even the morphine did much for her at least she is in a better place and no more pain knowing that has made it easier i miss her a lot but life goes on. again thank you
Posts.Title: Did anyone do just tamoxifen?

Posts.Content: i would say that if you have been without a period for 3 years and you are bleeding you need to see a dr could be a potential problem
Posts.Title: Did anyone do just tamoxifen?

Posts.Content: my mother did just tamoxifen in her left breat she had a 9 year sucess rate on the rt breast she was just 1 month shy of a 5 year sucess rate when she died . its something you need to ask a lot of questions about my mom was 69 when her breast cancer was discovered and 80 at her death.
Posts.Title: Did anyone do just tamoxifen?

Posts.Content: ssome of the drs want to chemo and or radiations as a precaution that it the cancer wont come bacak but that is just a precaution there are no promise of guarantees ever
Posts.Title: Did anyone do just tamoxifen?

Posts.Content: my mother has had bilateral breast removal left breast 9 years ago rt breast will be 5 years in april she was almost home free when 2 months ago so started complaining about this pain over her rt back rib well they after 2 months finally did a cat scan now the results metastatic bone cancer she is 80 i just dont know what to expect she will get a referral to an oncologist . my mom is 80
Posts.Title: breast cancer with bone metatasis

Posts.Content: thanks so much for your response wit h her insurance i cant just choose my own oncologist she is on a medicare hmo so i have to go with the program however if i am not happy then i tell the pcp and he can change to another oncologist at this point mom is already frail as she has been for a few years she says she il not take chemo or radiation therapy so i guess we will see what can be offerred at least for comfort . id your mom still alive ? did u have hospice
Posts.Title: breast cancer with bone metatasis
